name: The F*cking Evil Cloud
description: Corrupted by the forces of evil, you play a young angry cloud who's only satisfaction is to drench people to the death with whatever he can find, whether it be water, lemon juice or even beer. However, as a counter to your unstoppable fury, people have started to worship your worst enemy : the almighty Sun. But this won't prevent you from drowning more and more people in your drops, will it?
